passage.title: Elephants
passage.paragraph: Elephants have six teeth. Four of the teeth are about 30cm long. Two teeth can be over 100cm.
Elephants love water and they are very good swimmers. They like to have a bath every day.
Elephants eat plants. They eat about 255 kilograms a day. They drink 140 litres of water.
An elephant can live for about 70 years.
